#define STATIC_ASSERT_IS_HEX (   CHAR)
Value:
static_assert(((CHAR) >= 'A' && (CHAR) <= 'F') \
|| ((CHAR) >= 'a' && (CHAR) <= 'f') \
|| ((CHAR) >= '0' && (CHAR) <= '9'), \
"Invalid char, must be hexadecimal")
